code: import React,{useState}from"react";import s from"./Paginator.module.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";let Paginator=_ref=>{let{totalItemsCount,pageSize,currentPage,onPageChenged,portionSize=12}=_ref;let pagesCount=Math.ceil(totalItemsCount/pageSize);let pages=[];for(let i=1;i<=pagesCount;i++){pages.push(i+" ");};let portionCount=Math.ceil(pagesCount/portionSize);let[portionNumber,setPortionNumber]=useState(1);let leftPortionPageNumber=(portionNumber-1)*portionSize+1;let rightPortionPageNumber=portionNumber*portionSize;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:s.paginator,children:[" ",portionNumber>1&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>{setPortionNumber(portionNumber-1);},children:"PREV"}),pages.filter(p=>p>=leftPortionPageNumber&&p<=rightPortionPageNumber).map(p=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:currentPage===p&&s.selectedPage,onClick:e=>onPageChenged(p),children:p},p);}),portionCount>portionNumber&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>{setPortionNumber(portionNumber+1);},children:"Next"})]});};export default Paginator;
